channel.title: NZ Hiphop
channel.description:
New Zealand Hip Hop.
Talented rappers and if you're accentophiles you might get a boner over this shit.
A lot of these guys rap about real topics - living in poverty, living through substance abuse, relationships (not bad bitches...) Tom Scott features in the 3 songs below, a personal favourite of mine and comes from the same area as me.
A song about hard drugs, witnessing and living with substance abuse. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=McaTBPHED-U
A song about 2 individuals and their steps leading to suicide https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QJ8H7cqnDUM
A song about god https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rQHS79c753Q
